actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the reporting of committee funding resolutions for the period October 1, 1999, through February 28, 2001.

summary.text: Provides that by July 15, 1999, each Senate committee shall report one resolution authorizing the committee to make expenditures out of the contingent fund of the Senate to defray its expenses, including the compensation of staff members, for October 1, 1999, through February 28, 2001. Authorizes the Committee on Rules and Administration to report one authorization resolution containing more than one committee authorization resolution for such period.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the reporting of committee funding resolutions for the period October 1, 1999, through February 28, 2001.
